content.question: Object A of mass M is moving east at speed v. It collides with object B of mass 2M that was initially at rest. The motion of the objects before and after the collision is along the same line. After the collision, object A is moving west at a speed of v/3. What is the speed of object B immediately after the collision?

skill.text: 2.A: Derive a symbolic expression from known quantities by selecting and following a logical mathematical pathway.
